### Checklist
- [ ] I confirm that all edited files are encoded in UTF-8
- [ ] I did not add, delete, or reorder any translation entries
- [ ] I only edited translation text (translation and/or correction of existing entries)
- [ ] I did not modify keys, structure, or formatting
- [ ] I have read and agree to the terms in **[CLA.md](https://github.com/Gala-Lab/Flyff-Universe-Translations/blob/master/CLA.md)** and understand that my contributions become the exclusive property of Gala Lab Corp. and may not be reused outside this project
